de.ralleytn.simple.image

Class DecompositionGrayscaleFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.image.DecompositionGrayscaleFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.BiConsumer<int[][],int[][]>

    public class DecompositionGrayscaleFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.BiConsumer<int[][],int[][]>
    Grayscale filter that uses the color channel with either highest or the lowest value as the new pixel color.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DECOMPOSITION_MAXIMUM
      Use the color channel with the highest value as new pixel color.
      static int DECOMPOSITION_MINIMUM
      Use the color channel with the lowest value as new pixel color.
